abstract.t: The framework for SCHC defines an abstract view of the rules, formalized with through a YANG Data Model. In its original description rules are static and share by 2 entities. The use of YANG authorizes rules to be uploaded or modified in a SCHC instance and leads to some possible attacks, if the changes are not controlled. This document summarizes some possible attacks and define augmentation to the existing Data Mode, to restrict the changes in the rule.
